metadata.dc:author: Tallón-Barranco, A
Ayuso-Peralta, L
Jiménez-Jiménez, F J
Cabrera-Valdivia, F
Albarrán, F
metadata.dc:description: Multiple sclerosis is a disorder with different forms of clinical presentation. The Brown-Séquard syndrome has occasionally been described in association with multiple sclerosis. We present the case of a patient whose initial clinical presentation of multiple sclerosis was the Brown-Séquard syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Brown-Séquard como primera manifestación clínica de esclerosis múltiple.
[Brown-Séquard syndrome as the initial clinical manifestation ofmultiple sclerosis].
